name: Dead-End Detective: The Sixpence Strangler
description:
Dead-End Detective: The Sixpence Strangler is a comedic/thrilling visual novel set in London during the 1950s. Become the famed 'Dead-End Detective' as you investigate a sudden and unexplained series of strangulations in London's East End.

Choose how you want to conduct your investigation and interact with a colourful cast of characters along the way. Will you rely on your powers of perception and professionalism to solve this case? Or, will you just wing it and wisecrack your way through to the end?

Features...


  • Over 20 Character Sprites!
That's right! No more talking to invisible characters or shadowed outlines because the artist was lazy/underpaid/abducted by a race of halibut-headed, Lovecraftian humanoids for flushing too many goldfish down the U-bend.

  • Branching Dialog!
Choose between being professional or unprofessional. Appeasing or peevish. Smart or smart-mouthed. And, then, live with the consequences!

  • Nameable Protagonist!
Tired of playing visual novels with a blank-slate, generic main character with a pre-set boring name? Well, now you can play as a blank-slate, generic main character with a boring name of your own choice! Mmmm... immersion!
